name: evergranny tote
notes:
+[tutorial][1]

a modern take on the classic granny square turned into a practical tote bag in 3 different sizes - mini, midi & maxi. this pattern is very versatile and easily adjustable to the preferred dimensions. feel free to experiment! 

skill: **easy**
approx time: **1.5â€“5 hours** depending on the size

**materials**
- yarnart jeans (1-4 skeins) - weight 2 cotton/acrylic blend (145 - 500 m or 160 - 560 yds)
- 3 mm crochet hook
- yarn needle, scissors

**stitches and techniques used**
**mr** - magic ring
**sc** - single crochet
**hdc** - half double crochet
**dc** - double crochet
**stsc** - stacked single crochet


  [1]: https://youtu.be/4c1govnzxse?si=juinddcbhtwbmmmi
